description:
An unnamed girl, who is the world`s mana and the Great Seed. She is a collection of souls that were sacrificed to the Great Seed, among which http://anidb.net/ch34107 [Martel]`s. She was brought into existence as the guardian and Summon Spirit of the new World Tree, which http://anidb.net/ch11678 [Lloyd] is given the honour to name as part of their pact to protect the world and the tree.
In the game, she is called Tabatha. She is an android, and was created as an experiment to house Martel`s soul. At the end of the game, she fulfils the same role.
name: Shoujo
